name: S.O.F (saumpii)
description:
S.O.F is out Guys !!! Call up your friends no need to worry about Lockdown and get into multiplayer mode.

You all can make a room upto 8 players and see who comes out with highest amount of kills and who has zero gaming skills.Avoid Going at the corners That side is still under construction due to some issues i m facing while building.

It has Keys just like normal PC games anyways instructions are mentioned at the beginning of the game. Create Rooms,Search for rooms and here i come something Bada.

Have a watch for the video on my youtube and once i set up my game completely i will make the android version available actually its very easy to convert into mobile game with just changing inputs but i have to see about mirror and its functionality think which one actually is the best and cheap solution for my game make design more better and appealing.
